description:
go.exp/gotype: fix build
The builders do not run go install, only go test. Thus the gotype test cannot import
any packages other than the ones in the standard repo.
This is a workaround to get the build working by commenting out the
offending packages but a nicer fix would be welcome.

messages.text:
Hello rsc, adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.exp

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=573bdae23a58&repo=exp ***

go.exp/gotype: fix build
The builders do not run go install, only go test. Thus the gotype test cannot import
any packages other than the ones in the standard repo.
This is a workaround to get the build working by commenting out the
offending packages but a nicer fix would be welcome.

R=rsc, adg, gri
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7766043

subject: code review 7766043: go.exp/gotype: fix build
